description.originalText: Indrani is absolutely amazing! She has been with our family for almost three years now. She is patient, good-hearted, and responsible. Our little one has learned so much during his time with her and has clearly really enjoyed being with her. I feel very comfortable with her and my kids. She is such a pleasure to work with.

description.displayText: Indrani has been with my family for several years. I highly recommend her! She is reliable, dependable, more than punctual (usually early in fact), a good driver who has taken my kids to school and after school activities without any issues, and trustworthy. My kids love her like a second mother and there really is no higher praise for a nanny than that! Any family would be lucky to have her!
description.originalText: Indrani has been with my family for several years. I highly recommend her! description.displayText: It is with great pleasure that I recommend Indrani as a nanny. She is reliable, affectionate, and caring. She relates to our children in such a delightful way. They trust her, depend on her, and love playing with her. We feel fortunate to have had Indrani in our home caring for our two children. Indrani will make a lovely addition to your family.
description.originalText: It is with great pleasure that I recommend Indrani as a nanny. She is reliable, affectionate, and caring. She relates to our children in such a delightful way. They trust her, depend on her, and love playing with her. We feel fortunate to have had Indrani in our home caring for our two children. Indrani will make a lovely addition to your family.

description.displayText:
It is with great pleasure that I recommend Indrani as a nanny. Indrani has been working for us for over two years, taking care of our daughter, 9 years, and our son, 4 years. 
She is reliable, affectionate, and caring. She relates to our children in such a delightful way- they trust her, depend on her, and love playing with her. Their favorite activities include visiting the library and making crafts. 
Indrani manages her time well, establishing a schedule for the children to follow. Her approach to caring for our children complements our parenting well, as she respects our personal philosophies while being confident enough to make day-to-day decisions. Indrani is very structured in following the schedule with the children for their activities.
We feel fortunate to have had Indrani in our home caring for our two children. Indrani will make a lovely addition to your family.
Please don't hesitate to contact me with any questions, Indrani has my contact information.

description.displayText: Indrani has been working with our family for close to two years taking care of our two year old son and now our newborn baby. Indrani has been an excellent caregiver to our children. She is trustworthy, dependable and always has their best interests at heart. I would recommend her as a caregiver/nanny to any family looking for a person they can depend on!
